title: Sean Kelly: Pogačar Is the Standout Favorite for the Tour de France ‘He’s Been at an Amazing Level’
content:
Former pro says victory in the Tour could lead to a Vuelta challenge too: ‘It’s never been done. And he’s the guy who could do it.’

Read the full article at Sean Kelly: Pogačar Is the Standout Favorite for the Tour de France ‘He’s Been at an Amazing Level’ on Velo.
author: sstokes
